SEARCH
Package com.kukrisports.movie.catalogue.service

Interface MovieService

All Known Implementing Classes:
MovieServiceImpl
public interface MovieService
Service interface for managing movies in the catalog.

This interface defines operations related to the creation, updating, deletion, and retrieval of movies. Movies are represented by the MovieDTO data transfer object, which includes details such as title, release date, director, and rating.

The service layer interacts with the underlying repository or database to perform these operations.

See Also:
  • MovieDTO
  • DirectorDTO

  • Method Details

    • createMovie

      MovieDTO createMovie(MovieDTO movie)
      Creates a new movie in the catalog.

      This method persists a new movie using the provided MovieDTO object.

      Parameters:
      movie - the MovieDTO object containing movie details
      Returns:
      the created MovieDTO object with its generated ID

    • updateMovie

      MovieDTO updateMovie(UUID movieId, MovieDTO movie)
      Updates an existing movie's details.

      This method updates the details of an existing movie using the provided movie ID.

      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie to update
      movie - the MovieDTO object containing the updated movie details
      Returns:
      the updated MovieDTO object

    • deleteMovie

      void deleteMovie(UUID movieId)
      Deletes a movie by its ID.

      This method removes a movie from the catalog based on the provided movie ID.

      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie to delete

    • fetchMovieById

      MovieDTO fetchMovieById(UUID movieId)
      Retrieves a movie by its ID.

      This method fetches a movie from the catalog using its unique identifier.

      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie to retrieve
      Returns:
      the MovieDTO object representing the movie, or null if not found

    • fetchAllMovies

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<MovieDTO> fetchAllMovies(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves all movies with pagination.

      This method fetches all movies from the catalog and paginates the result using the provided Pageable object.

      Parameters:
      pageable - the pagination details (e.g., page size and page number)
      Returns:
      a Page of MovieDTO objects representing the movies

    • fetchMoviesByDirectorId

      DirectorDTO fetchMoviesByDirectorId(UUID directorId)
      Retrieves all movies by a specific director's ID.

      This method fetches all movies from the catalog that are directed by the specified director.

      Parameters:
      directorId - the ID of the director whose movies are to be fetched
      Returns:
      a DirectorDTO object containing the director's details and a list of movies

    • fetchMoviesByRatingGreaterThanEqualTo

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<MovieDTO> fetchMoviesByRatingGreaterThanEqualTo(Double rating, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves all movies with a rating greater than or equal to the specified value.

      This method fetches all movies from the catalog that have a rating greater than or equal to the specified rating. The results are paginated based on the provided Pageable object.

      Parameters:
      rating - the minimum rating value
      pageable - the pagination details (e.g., page size and page number)
      Returns:
      a Page of MovieDTO objects representing the movies with the specified rating
